page.title: 17MY HOUSE
page.content: Beacon Lodge, which is to be found on Alderley Edge is a sandstone building Above the door it has the letters :I.T.S, M.J.S, 1837. These are the initials of Sir John Thomas Stanley who became the first Lord Stanley of Alderley in 1837 and his wife Marie Josepha.When we moved in to the Lodge it was horrible, dust everywhere. Because the lodge was quite small we had to have an extension attached to it. We had several goats so we had to make a goat house and a run for them. We had one acre of land at the back of our garden, it was very weedy. Because the Lodge was right on the Edge we had plenty of opportunity to walk the dogs and goats and to enjoy the countryside.
